entry.title: eagudio/rabast: Rabast is a lightweight and high-performance web framework built on Ciaplu, offering a simple and efficient API for handling HTTP requests and responses.
entry.content: Rabast is a lightweight and high-performance web framework built on Ciaplu, offering a simple and efficient API for handling HTTP requests and responses.

entry.title: thegreedymaster1234/JavaScript-Email-Protection-JEP: JavaScript Email Protection (JEP) is a simple and lightweight way to keep your email safe from spam bots. Instead of leaving your email exposed in plain HTML (where bots can easily grab it), this script dynamically inserts it using JavaScript—making it way harder for scrapers to detect.
entry.content: JavaScript Email Protection (JEP) is a simple and lightweight way to keep your email safe from spam bots. Instead of leaving your email exposed in plain HTML (where bots can easily grab it), this script dynamically inserts it using JavaScript—making it way harder for scrapers to detect.

entry.title: ChandanJain009/nodejs-nano-service: A lightweight event-driven microservices package for RabbitMQ in Node.js. Enables asynchronous communication, message publishing and consuming, and scalable event-driven architecture. Perfect for distributed systems and real-time applications.
entry.content: A lightweight event-driven microservices package for RabbitMQ in Node.js. Enables asynchronous communication, message publishing and consuming, and scalable event-driven architecture. Perfect for distributed systems and real-time applications.

entry.title: Amitava-Roy/Gen-AI-Analytics: This project is a lightweight backend service that simulates an AI-powered data query system. It processes **natural language queries** and converts them into **SQLite queries** to fetch mock sales data.
entry.content: This project is a lightweight backend service that simulates an AI-powered data query system. It processes **natural language queries** and converts them into **SQLite queries** to fetch mock sales data.

entry.content: A super lightweight TS-based capture tool encapsulating playwright.dev

entry.title: Trupti-coder/newsApp-Project: A modern, responsive web application built with React that delivers the latest news from various categories in real-time. This app fetches news data from an external API and presents it in an engaging and user-friendly interface. It is designed to be fast, lightweight, and accessible across all devices.
entry.content: A modern, responsive web application built with React that delivers the latest news from various categories in real-time. This app fetches news data from an external API and presents it in an engaging and user-friendly interface. It is designed to be fast, lightweight, and accessible across all devices.

entry.title: actioncrew/streamix: Streamix is a lightweight reactive library that adopts known RxJS operators while using a simpler, generator-based approach for flexible and efficient data streams.
entry.content: Streamix is a lightweight reactive library that adopts known RxJS operators while using a simpler, generator-based approach for flexible and efficient data streams.

entry.title: inversify/monorepo: A powerful and lightweight inversion of control container for JavaScript & Node.js apps powered by TypeScript.
entry.content: A powerful and lightweight inversion of control container for JavaScript & Node.js apps powered by TypeScript.

entry.title: zayne-labs/call-api: A lightweight fetching library packed with essential features - retries, interceptors, request deduplication and much more, all while still retaining a similar API surface with regular Fetch.
entry.content: A lightweight fetching library packed with essential features - retries, interceptors, request deduplication and much more, all while still retaining a similar API surface with regular Fetch.

entry.title: neuroborus/ethers-tools: ethers-tools is a zero-dependency lightweight JavaScript/TypeScript library built on top of ethers.js designed to simplify smart contract interactions and multicall3 aggregation on the Ethereum blockchain and compatible EVM networks.
entry.content: ethers-tools is a zero-dependency lightweight JavaScript/TypeScript library built on top of ethers.js designed to simplify smart contract interactions and multicall3 aggregation on the Ethereum blockchain and compatible EVM networks.

entry.title: Siddiqui145/full_stack_node: This is a full-stack application with a Node.js and Express backend serving motivational quotes via an API and a React frontend that fetches and displays them using Axios. The backend can be deployed separately on platforms like Render or Vercel, while the frontend integrates seamlessly by updating the API endpoint. The project is lightweight &easy
entry.content: This is a full-stack application with a Node.js and Express backend serving motivational quotes via an API and a React frontend that fetches and displays them using Axios. The backend can be deployed separately on platforms like Render or Vercel, while the frontend integrates seamlessly by updating the API endpoint. The project is lightweight &easy

entry.content: lightweight. simple for Node.js

entry.title: letmaker/liko: Liko is a simple, fast, and lightweight H5 render framework by typescript. Liko is a high-performance rendering engine based on WebGPU, designed for AI. Liko can be used for games, H5 applications, and interactive interactions.
entry.content: Liko is a simple, fast, and lightweight H5 render framework by typescript. Liko is a high-performance rendering engine based on WebGPU, designed for AI. Liko can be used for games, H5 applications, and interactive interactions.
